contextId.information: The word "now" marks a change from the story to background information about how long the people of Israel traveled and about God's anger towards that generation. This is background information about King Og. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: For of the remnant ... the way people measure

contextId.information: The writer begins to present background information about the land that the people of Israel captured. If your language has a way of showing that what follows is background information, you should use it here. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: The same territory is called the land of Rephaim

contextId.information: This gives background information about where the people of Israel traveled. It also covers Aaron's natural death in Moserah. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: The people of Israel ... a land of streams of water
